metadata.synopsis: Non-critpath. A child who speaks solely in grunts. He will disappear into a hidden hatch in the ground the first time he's encountered. He will return a day later and the player can convince him to reveal the hidden entrance if they're careful.

41.speaker: Narrator
41.text: *He stares past you, as if you aren't there at all.*

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Hey. Thanks for showing me the door.

0.speaker: Player
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: swordfighting motionsNodeContext: swordfighting grunts

6.speaker: Doni
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: swordfighting motionsNodeContext: swordfighting grunts

73.speaker: Narrator
73.text: *His eyes flicker to yours for an instant, then away, as if it hurts to look at you.*

34.speaker: Player
34.text: Where the hells did you disappear to before?
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: |makes a complex series of hand movements|NodeContext: Explanatory

31.speaker: Narrator
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: |makes a complex series of hand movements|NodeContext: Explanatory

65.speaker: Doni
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: |makes a complex series of hand movements|NodeContext: Explanatory

21.speaker: Narrator
21.text: *Watching his hands, you realise he's miming opening something.*
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: shaking headNodeContext: a NO grunt

1.speaker: Player
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: shaking headNodeContext: a NO grunt

64.speaker: Doni
64.text: Got to keep watch... but it's so bright and noisy here. Want to be back in the hideout.
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: shaking headNodeContext: a NO grunt

74.speaker: Doni
74.text: Got to keep watch... but it's so bright and noisy here. Want to be back in the hideout.
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: shaking headNodeContext: a NO grunt

33.speaker: Player
33.text: It's bright and noisy up here, huh? I wish there were somewhere darker to rest.
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: shaking headNodeContext: a NO grunt

8.speaker: Narrator
8.text: *He nods, then reaches for a concealed hatch.*

52.speaker: Player
52.text: Is it a chest? A door? Can you show me where it is?
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: shaking headNodeContext: a NO grunt

39.speaker: Doni
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: shaking headNodeContext: a NO grunt

13.context: CinematicNodeContext: shaking headNodeContext: a NO grunt

35.speaker: Doni
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: shaking headNodeContext: a NO grunt

42.text: *He's trying to tell you something, but you can't make any sense of it.*

44.speaker: Narrator
44.text: *He's trying to tell you something, but you can't make any sense of it.*

36.speaker: Player
36.text: Maybe some gold would catch your attention? ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: he nods and 'receives' the gold off-camera

62.speaker: Doni
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: he nods and 'receives' the gold off-camera

54.speaker: Player
54.text: Turn to see what he's looking at.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: PC turns and then a shot of what's behind them

3.context: CinematicNodeContext: PC turns and then a shot of what's behind them

47.speaker: Narrator
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: turning back to look at Doni - but he's gone.

60.speaker: Doni
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: noddingNodeContext: A YES grunt.

37.speaker: Narrator
37.text: *He stares right past you as if you're invisible. Or boring.*
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: noddingNodeContext: A YES grunt.

15.speaker: Player
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: noddingNodeContext: A YES grunt.

51.speaker: Doni
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: noddingNodeContext: A YES grunt.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: I see. Anything else on your mind?

27.speaker: Player
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: shruggingNodeContext: "I know, right?" - responding to the player grunting at him -

22.speaker: Doni
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: shruggingNodeContext: "I know, right?" - responding to the player grunting at him -

55.speaker: Player
55.text: Turn around to see what has his attention.
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Not a full turn-around. The character should credibly be able to see the grunting kid out of the corner of their eye.

53.speaker: Narrator
53.text: *You see nothing out of the ordinary.*
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Not a full turn-around. The character should credibly be able to see the grunting kid out of the corner of their eye.

28.speaker: Player
28.text: *As you turn back, the child slips between the rocks.*

12.speaker: Narrator
12.text: *As you turn back, the child slips between the rocks.*

72.speaker: Narrator
72.text: *As you turn back, the child slips between the rocks.*

63.speaker: Narrator
63.text: Search the rocks for an opening.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: Search the rocks for an opening.

61.speaker: Player
61.text: Examine the rocks for anything out of the ordinary.

16.speaker: Player
16.text: Study the rocks for a secret passage.

5.speaker: Narrator
5.text: *You find the edges of a concealed entrance.*

11.speaker: Narrator
11.text: *You find the edges of a concealed entrance.*

9.speaker: Narrator
9.text: *No trigger or handle, though. No way to open it.*

68.text: *You look the rocks over, but find no sign of a way through.*

38.speaker: Narrator
38.text: *You look the rocks over, but find no sign of a way through.*

40.text: *When you turn back, there's no trace of the child.*

26.speaker: Player
26.text: *When you turn back, there's no trace of the child.*

20.speaker: Narrator
20.text: *When you turn back, there's no trace of the child.*

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Doni, isn't it? I want to see the Dragon's Lair.

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Turn around to see what he's looking at.
